description.value:
Prerequisite: Not a scoundrel (class), @UUID[Compendium.everyday-heroes.feats.vgdztK8DBmylYdZU]{Scoundrel Training} feat, Level 8+

You have learned all the best ways to hurt a person when they don't see it coming.

  • Choose one from Acrobatics, Deception, Intimidation, Security, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, and Streetwise. You gain expertise in the chosen skill.

  • Once during your turn, when you hit a target with an attack, if you had advantage on that attack or an ally is within 5 feet of that target, you can choose to deal an additional 2d6 damage. You cannot deal this additional damage if the attack had disadvantage.
description.chat: When you hit a target with an attack, if you had advantage on that attack or an ally is within 5 feet of that target, you can choose to deal an additional [[2d6]] damage. You cannot deal this additional damage if the attack had disadvantage.

activation.condition: Once during your turn, when you hit a target with an attack, if you had advantage on that attack or an ally is within 5 feet of that target.
